translations: v.用桩篱把……围起；包围（pale 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: (纹章图案)一个竖置于另一个之上的；(单图案)竖置于中部的

sentences.sentence: Your paling small does not serve the world.
sentences.translation: 你玩得越小，世人就越不把你当回事。

sentences.sentence: He has just put up a paling around the house.
sentences.translation: 院子周围竖立着一道新的栅栏。

sentences.sentence: A new paling had been erected around the yard.
sentences.translation: 院子周围竖立着一道新的栅栏。
